charges.charge_description: 18:371 &; 2 CONSPIRACY TO COMMIT THEFT OF MAIL IN VIOLATION OF 18:1708; AND AIDING &; ABETTING (1)

charges.charge_disposition: SENTENCING: COUNT 1-deft placed on probation for a term of 2 yrs.; stand conds #l-#13 adopted by Crt; the periodic drug testing mandated by the Violent Crime Control &; Law Enforcement Act of l994 is hereby suspended; Crt finds that the present case is not a drug related case &; that the deft does not have a problem w/drugs; deft shall comply w/the following spec conds: deft shall not possess a firearm/destructive device; deft shall perform 50 hrs. of community svc as directed by the prob officer; deft ordered to pay a spec ass't of $50, due immediately; Crt finds that the deft does not have the ability to pay a fine &; Crt waives fine in this case. (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:1708 THEFT OR RECEIPT OF STOLEN MAIL (2-3)

charges.charge_disposition: SENTENCING: COUNTS 2,3,11-deft placed on probation for at term of 2 yrs.; stand conds #l-#13 adopted by Crt; deft shall comply w/following spec conds: #14-deft shall not possess a firearm/destructive device; #15-deft shall pay any financial penalty that is imposed by this jdmt; #17-deft shall not incur new credit charges or open add'l lines of credit w/o the approval of the prob officer unless deft is in compliance w/installment payment schedule; #18-deft shall provide the prob officer w/access to any requested financial info; deft ordered to pay a spec ass't of $50, due immediately; deft further ordered to make restitution to First Fidelity Bankcard Security, l00 Fidelity Plaza, North Brunswick, New Jersey 08905, Attn: Mary Ann Spinelli, in the amt of $1834.37; restitution is ordered to be joint &; several w/other co-defts; restitution shall be paid in monthly installments of $38.21 to commence 30 days after the date of this jdmt; deft shall notify the U.S. Atty for this dist w/in 30 days of any change of mailing or residence address that occurs while any portion of the restitution remains unpaid; Crt finds that the deft does not have the ability to pay a fine &; waives same. (2-3)

(11)

charges.charge_description: 18:371 &; 2 CONSPIRACY TO COMMIT THEFT OF MAIL IN VIOLATION OF 18:1708; AND AIDING &; ABETTING (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Pursuant to Rule 48(a) of the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure the US Attorney for the Northern District of Indiana dismisses Counts 1,4,5, 6,7,8,9 and 10 of the indictment. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Pursuant to Rule 48(a) of the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure the US Attorney for the Northern District of Indiana dismisses Counts 1,4,5, 6,7,8,9 and 10 of the indictment. (4-10)

charges.charge_description: 18:1708 THEFT OR RECEIPT OF STOLEN MAIL (2-3)

charges.charge_disposition: SENTENCING: COUNTS 2,3,11-deft placed on probation for a term of 2 yrs.; this term consists of terms of 2 yrs. on each of Counts 2,3,ll, such terms to run concurrently; stand conds #1-#13 adopted by Crt; the periodic drug testing mandated by the Violent Crime Control &; Law Enforcement Act of l994 is hereby suspended; Crt finds the instant offense is not drug related &; the deft has no history of substance abuse; deft shall not illegally possess a controlled substance; deft shall comply w/the following spec conds: #14-deft shall not possess a firearm/destructive device; #15-deft shall pay any financial penalty that is imposed by this jdmt; #18-deft shall provide the prob officer w/access to any requested financial info; deft ordered to pay a spec asst of $150.00, to be paid w/in 30 days; deft further ordered to make restitution to First Fidelity Bank, Bank Card Security, l00 Fidelity Plaza, North Brunswick, New Jersey l8905, to the attention of Mary Ann Spinelli, in the amt of $l834.37; deft's restitution obligations shall not be affected by any restitution payments that may be made by other defts in this case; restitution shall be paid in full immediately; deft shall notify the U.S. Atty for this dist w/in 30 days of any change of mailing or residence address that occurs while any portion of the restitution remains unpaid; restitution shall be paid in monthly installments of $76.43 over a period of 12 mos., to commence 30 days after the date of this jdmt; deft shall perform 50 hrs. of community svc as directed by prob officer; Crt finds that the deft does not have the ability to pay a fine &; waives same. (2-3)

SENTENCING: COUNTS 2,3,11-deft placed on probation for a term of 2 yrs.; this term consists of terms of 2 yrs. on each of Counts 2,3,ll, such terms to run concurrently; stand conds #1-#13 adopted by Crt; the periodic drug testing mandated by the Violent Crime Control &; Law Enforcement Act of l994 is hereby suspended; Crt finds the instant offense is not drug related &; the deft has no history of substance abuse; deft shall not illegally possess a controlled substance; deft shall comply w/the following spec conds: #14-deft shall not possess a firearm/destructive device; #15-deft shall pay any financial penalty that is imposed by this jdmt; #18-deft shall provide the prob officer w/access to any requested financial info; deft ordered to pay a spec asst of $150.00, to be paid w/in 30 days; deft further ordered to make restitution to First Fidelity Bank, Bank Card Security, l00 Fidelity Plaza, North Brunswick, New Jersey l8905, to the attention of Mary Ann Spinelli, in the amt of $l834.37; deft's restitution obligations shall not be affected by any restitution payments that may be made by other defts in this case; restitution shall be paid in full immediately; deft shall notify the U.S. Atty for this dist w/in 30 days of any change of mailing or residence address that occurs while any portion of the restitution remains unpaid; restitution shall be paid in monthly installments of $76.43 over a period of 12 mos., to commence 30 days after the date of this jdmt; deft shall perform 50 hrs. of community svc as directed by prob officer; Crt finds that the deft does not have the ability to pay a fine &; waives same. (11)
